response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to us at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and expectations. I am offering this extraordinary item to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a high-quality product at a price that reflects its true worth while allowing me to maximize the value of my investment. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
